Description:
Great Value in Clyde
This brand new house and land package is located in a sought after area on a level block close to all services. The popular 4 bedroom design features a tiled entry with direct access into the garage, wonderful kitchen with walk in pantry and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher with an adjoining meals/living area and a separate lounge/rumpus room. All of the bedrooms have built in robes, whilst the master has an ensuite with double vanities and a walk in robe. The garage is remote control and has direct entry into the home. Built as a turn key property, this home comes ready to move into and is complete with all floor coverings, roller blinds to the windows, fly wire screens, basic landscaping, fences, driveway, clothesline, TV antenna, letterbox and more. Ideal for the owner occupier or the astute investor.
Insights: 17 Fortitude Circuit, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Family Home With Three Living Zones
APPOINTMENTS TO INSPECT NOT AVAILABLE UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.
This modern 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home has been designed and constructed to the highest of standards. With neutral tones and contemporary features, it's the perfect combination of comfort and style. The highlights of the property include three living zones, paved outdoor living/dining, skylights, a study nook and a powder room for guests.
The contemporary kitchen has designer details with feature lighting, sleek cabinetry and white stone benchtops with breakfast bar. This open-plan kitchen/living/dining area is comfortable and inviting with huge sliding doors, gorgeous wooden floors and downlighting. Relax indoors in one of the three living zones or on the paved outdoor patio, the choice is yours. A landscaped backyard leads to the double garage which is located at the rear of the property.
The master bedroom is a great size with a WIR and en suite, an indulgent space with an expansive floating vanity, wall to wall mirror and large shower. The family bathroom features a floating wood grained vanity, a bath and shower, with a separate laundry and powder room for guests.
Main features include:
Open-plan kitchen/living/dining
Three living spaces to choose from
Paved patio leading from living space
Two bathrooms plus laundry & powder room
Three sizeable bedrooms
Master bedroom with en suite & WIR
Gorgeous timber floors & durable carpet throughout
Central heating & split units
Easy to maintain landscaped garden
Double garage at end of property
With amenities like playgrounds and parks, schools, shops, sports complexes and more within close vicinity, this home is the right choice. Access Melbourne CBD via the M1 and Cranbourne Train Station, or take a drive to the Mornington Peninsula and the surrounding coastal areas.
Start making precious memories with your family! Book an inspection to view this stunning home today.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions in the content and photos are approximate only.
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS***

http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
TITLED, 789sqm, NO EASEMENTS, Creek Front.
Titled, Fenced and ready to build is this incredible 789sqm block of land in the sought after Stocklands Estate, Edgebrook. Overlooking parklands with waterways running through, playgrounds, picnic area and walking tracks to follow, this block is sure to impress anyone looking to build their dream home.
The following amenities such as Clyde Recreation Reserve, Casey RACE Recreation and Aquatic Centre and Cranbourne Little Athletics Centre are only a stones throw away.
Do not miss out on this opportunity and call today as this will not last long!

Description:
Build Your Dream Home!! TITLED LAND!!
Edgebrook is destined to become a thriving new city within Melbourne's fast growing south-eastern suburbs.
Set on a beautiful natural landscape with stunning Clyde creek running through the centre, Edgebrook will offer a tranquil atmosphere to over 2,000 residents when complete.
With a block size of 448sqm (approx.), it is large enough to build a beautiful house in a relaxing haven of privacy. The block is situated in a convenient location with all the amenities nearby and close to nature, all within an amazing multicultural neighbourhood.
Whether you are buying your first home, or looking to upgrade to something a little bigger, there has never been a better time to secure your family's future.

Description:
PERFECT CLYDE BUYING!
Clyde: **PLEASE CONTACT AGENT TO DISCUSS INSPECTIONS** If you've been searching for the perfect property to upgrade/downsize into or rent out without having to endure a lengthy building process, then you must inspect this fine opportunity.
This property offers a free-flowing floor plan that is sure to be appreciated by all. There are 3 spacious robed bedrooms, the master is complete with ensuite & WIR, whilst bedrooms 2 & 3 are in close proximity to the full family bathroom at the rear of the home. A light and bright central hostess kitchen that's complete with stone benchtops, free-standing 900mm stainless oven/ cooktop, rangehood & dishwasher, all this and a whole lot more overlooking the open living/ meals area with sliding door access to the backyard.
Internal extras include gas ducted heating, quality flooring and neutral tones throughout.
Outside you will be greeted by a modern facade, modern landscaping, lengthy driveway, great for having an extra car or trailer & a double garage with remote and internal access. A carefree back yard that is complete with a deck perfect for all year round use, with room to build a pergola S.T.C.A. and still have enough room for the kids and dogs to play.
Clyde is located on the outskirts of Cranbourne Central. The area offers a number of accessible shopping centres, easy access to public transport and close by to a number of schools, childcare and is also located nearby is the Casey Fields football ground, Casey Race Recreation & Aquatic Centre, and Casey Library.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation call today before it's GOING, GOING ..... GONE!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS!
DISCLAIMERS:
Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, however it does not constitute any representation by the vendor, agent or agency.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
Internal area
113m²

Description:
Developments Opportunity - STCA
This 2.47 acre (10,000 sqm approx.) parcel of land is located in the fast-growing region of Clyde. Set for potential development (STCA) this suburb has great access to public transport, educational institutions and shopping precincts.
Clyde offers plenty of features that help cater to those who lead an active lifestyle. With bordering properties currently being developed, now is a great time to purchase this land and develop yourself. This block is located with a Main Street frontage, relatively flat land and within easy access to the freeway.

Description:
Carlisle built family home in Hartleigh estate!!!
A rarity in the market built by reputed Carlisle Homes, this well-designed home is tucked away in family focused Hartleigh estate which provides modern, quality & convenient life with easy access to all necessary amenities and peaceful surroundings. Flooded with natural light and offering stylish and modern finishes throughout, this great property would impress anyone who inspect it.
Grand double doors will welcome you and your family/friends with warmth and luxury into a wide passageway and front study, followed by a formal lounge, elegant island benchtop with 80mm stone benchtop, dream of a kitchen with ample storage space, 900mm undermount cooktop & Oven with window splash-back, kitchenette with 600mm cooktop & sink, open plan kitchen and living zone, large theatre room at the back of home, powder room, decked alfresco opens to a large backyard with possible side access to park a caravan, boat, trailer or build a pool in the near future (subject to council requirements & permits)
Come upstairs to another spacious living zone, three bedrooms with walkin robes, grand master bedroom with his & her walking robes, ensuite with double vanities, large shower & spa and Balcony overlooking the waterfront, perfect sanctuary to relax and unwind after a successful day
With immaculate presentation and an array of stylish fixtures and fittings throughout spacious interior, your new home offers
- Front Study room
- Black Taps all throughout
- Multiple Living Zones (3 downstairs & 1 living upstairs)
- Large theatre at the back of home
- Elegant Kitchen with 900mm undermount Cooktop and Oven
- kitchenette with 600mm cooktop
- Powder room

Description:
BEAUTY WITH SPACE!!
Presenting an amazing 6 bed double storey home with all the bells & whistles. Constructed with the most brilliant quality & care, this 3 year old home ticks the boxes for first home buyers & growing families. As you walk through this immaculately presented 37sq home, you will notice an endless list of quality inclusions.
UPSTAIRS you have 6 generous bedrooms, including master bedroom with featuring 2 walk in robes, ensuite with dual vanity, large shower. The 5 remaining bedrooms have built in robes accompanied by a central bathroom with separate toilet. There is even a linen storage and leisure living area!
DOWNSTAIRS have an open plan kitchen with large walk in pantry, a dining/family area, theatre room for quality family time, powder room, laundry and another separate lounge at entrance. Three living spaces give the whole family their own personal relaxation areas.
This exceptional home is the perfect way to begin your new lifestyle, and the features do not stop there, with outside featuring an amazing outdoor covered alfresco area for those weekend bbq's, broader driveway to park cars and beautifully landscaped. There is a separate paved and soft top area for the kids to play around and a brand new fully manicured backyard with plenty of space for children or pets to enjoy.
You don't want to miss this beautiful opportunity so please call Sahil on 0469 739 010 to book an appointment.
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
NOT TO BE MISSED..Built On 485 sqm Land !!
Century 21 Casey proudly presents this Beautiful House in the heart of Pasadena Estate Clyde!!
It's not so often a property comes that is very special and family oriented. This stunning residence embraces a contemporary feel with a succession of light filled living spaces. With quality fixtures and fittings throughout and a great street presence, this home is situated in the most demanded area of Clyde and is next to proposed golf course.
Master bedroom includes spacious walk in robe and en suite bathroom with double vanity and toilet. Two more spacious bedrooms facilitated by spacious bathroom that includes shower and bath tub with separate toilet. Entertain in light-filled informal open plan living area incorporating a superb kitchen fitted with upgraded 900mm appliances, stone bench tops and Island bench with breakfast bar, ample work space.
Other features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, 2 car garage with remote control, contemporary neutral interiors with quality plush carpets and tiles, Spacious laundry with storage solutions, fully landscaped front and backyard, alfresco sitting area and security cameras.
Located amongst other quality built homes in close proximity to Shopping centre, proposed train station and walking distance to local parks & playgrounds.
You don't want to miss this beautiful opportunity so please call Sahil on 0469 739 010 to book an appointment.
Photo ID is a must.

This well positioned block (Lot 715) is ready to build on, titled and is a great size of 392 square metres, with a frontage of 14 m and length of 28 m.

Description:
Brand New in Edgebrook!!!
Edgebrook is carefully designed by reputed developer stockland to meet family lifestyle, livability and convenience,
with walking tracks, dog parks and picturesque Clyde Creek running through middle of the estate and surrounded with all necessary amnesties, edgebrook is the place to call home.
Come home to 4 spacious bedrooms, BIRs, master with luxurious en-suite, with his & hers vanities & walk in robe. Three more spacious bedroom with generous wardrobe spaces to keep the rest of the family satisfied, cook up a storm with your fully equipped designer kitchen, with European 900mm S/S appliances, Caesar-Stone grand island bench & large walk-in pantry
Adjoining open-plan dining & family room with an additional separate lounge and theater room make this simply no finer way to entertain your family and friends.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Other features include
- European 900mm Stainless steel appliances
- Caesar-Stone grand island bench (with breakfast bar)
- Large walk-in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Stone Benchtops in Kitchen, Ensite & Bathroom
- Pendent lights in Kitche
- 900mm Five burner Cooktop
- 900mm Oven
- Front landscaping
- Remote control panel lift garage
- Fully fenced
- Feature wooden ceiling at entry
- Downlights allthroughout
- Elegant floating boards to hallway, living, meals, kitchen
- Quality Carpets to Bedrooms
- Well designed Alfresco
Your new home is located in easy access to
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
Simply Move In And Enjoy
Please contact the agent to arrange an open for inspection time. New Covid rules apply.
512M2 BLOCK
EDGEBROOK ESTATE - CLYDE
FULLY APPOINTED EX DISPLAY HOME
Epitomising quality, style and sophistication at the highest of standards, this beautifully appointed Ex Premiere Display Home showcases everything you would come to expect from a display home and is sure to impress the moment you arrive!
Standout features of the home include:
4 Bedrooms Master complete with full ensuite & huge WIR
3 Separate living areas which include a formal lounge open plan family room & separate rumpus / theatre room
Beautifully appointed kitchen featuring quality appliances & crafted cabinetry
Walk in pantry & Scullery
Solid hardwood timber flooring throughout
Gas log fire Ducted Refrigerated heating & Cooling
Covered alfresco area
This is one of this area's newest and most in demand addresses with quality display & owner-occupied homes being built by those in search of a fantastic lifestyle. Only a short drive to major shopping centres, public transport, golf clubs, Cranbourne Race Club, local parks, bars and restaurants.
This is a turn key package - simply move in and enjoy!
For all inspection contact Brad Townsend on 0458 960 000

Description:
Brand new Custom Designed Family House..!!
This custom designed family house is located in family friendly Hartleigh estate which provides modern, quality & convenient life with easy access to all necessary amenities and peaceful surroundings. With quality finishes and fitting throughout this fabulous house will impress anyone who inspects it.
Filled with loads of natural light house's free flowing interior comprises a front formal lounge, master bedroom with walk-in robes and full ensuite with double vanity, three more rooms with built in robes serviced with main bathroom. An open plan expansive living,dining, and well finished kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, five burner cooktop, stone bench top and walk in pantry, come outside to find covered alfresco perfect for BBQ.
Your new home comes with following inclusions
- Tiles to hallway and open living, dining and kitchen
- Quality carpets to bedrooms and lounge
- LED Down-lights throughout the house
- 900 mm five burner cook top
- 40mm stone bench-top
- Walkin pantry
- Ample storage space throughout
- Dishwasher
- Pendant lights to island bench
- Covered alfresco
- Double lockup garage with internal access to house
Your new home is located in east access to
- Clyde Primary School
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 or Dilshan 0402 696 602 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
!!BRAND NEW HOME, FIRST HOME OWNER BUYER!! Or PERFECT FOR INVESTOR !!!!
Situated in the sought after Lilium Estate, You will love to come home to this contemporary & luxurious home with its high ceilings, accommodating floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere. The focal point of this residence is its open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space, which all flow together effortlessly onto the Backyard area. You will not only be investing in this distinguished location, but also a flawless, and pristine design
This home is brimming with features, including:
Three bedrooms, all with built in robes plus the Study.
Master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite with stone benchtop, and large shower
Separate living areas conveniently positioned around the home include a front formal living, family room adjacent to kitchen and dining.
INCLUSIONS
- High Ceilings
- Stainless steel Oven
- Stainless steel 900mm gas burner cook top
- Stainless steel Range hood
- 900mm Stainless steel Dishwasher
- Stone Bench-top to Kitchen
- Stone Benches to bathroom Vanity
- LED Down Lights Throughout house
- Fencing to all required sides
- Duct ed Heating and Cooling
- Front Landscaping
- Double Garage space with remote roller door
CLOSE BY TO
- Bus stops (route 897 Clyde - Lynbrook station),
- Waterfronts
- Future shopping centre
- Future railway station
- Wilandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- St Peters Secondary
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school.
Lilium Estate is carefully designed by reputed developer stockland to meet family lifestyle, livability and convenience,
with walking tracks, dog parks and picturesque Clyde Creek running through middle of the estate and surrounded with all necessary amnesties, Lilium is the place to call home.
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
CALL NOW TO BOOK YOUR OWN APPOINTMENT WITH LARRY ON 0497 770 666 !! *PRIVATE INSPECTION ONLY*
*Please note images are for illustration purposes only*

Description:
Start Living Your Dream
Elegantly designed with contemporary aesthetic, this generous near new double storey four bedroom family home in Belmond on Clyde provides modern, quality and convenient life with easy access to all necessary amenities and peaceful surroundings. Flooded with natural light and offering stylish and modern finishes throughout, this great property would impress anyone who inspect it. Conveniently located short distance to Clyde shopping centre , primary and secondary schools, parks , walking tracks , childcare centres and future Westfield Shopping Centre and Clyde train station.
With immaculate presentation this masterpiece features
Four bedrooms upstairs and the study downstairs with doors which can be used as a fifth bedroom
Master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite with double vanity, Caesarstone benchtop and large shower
Remote controlled double lock up garage with internal access
Modern kitchen features Caesarstone island benchtop, 900mm oven and cooker, dishwasher, clear glass splashback and walk-in-pantry
Zoned ducted heating, Evaporative cooling for upstairs and split system air conditioner downstairs
Three separate living areas
LED downlights throughout and much much more!!
Built by Eight Homes , this is a rare opportunity to own your dream home in Belmond estate . Be quick to enquire not to miss this golden opportunity.
ONLY one thing left to do...
